metadata.name: Potential Obfuscated Ordinal Call Via Rundll32
metadata.comment: Detects execution of "rundll32" with potential obfuscated ordinal calls

batch.sql: SELECT * FROM process_activity WHERE time BETWEEN CURRENT_TIMESTAMP() - INTERVAL 24 HOUR AND CURRENT_TIMESTAMP() AND (lower(activity_id) = lower('1') AND endswith(lower(process.name), lower('\\rundll32.exe')) AND lower(process.file.name) = lower('rundll32.exe') AND contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('rundll32')) AND (contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('#+')) OR contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('#-'))))

output.summary: Detects execution of "rundll32" with potential obfuscated ordinal calls

metadata.objective: False positive: Unknown Reference: Internal Research
